params.account: The address of the account to get the balance of.

params.until: The new unlocking timestamp in seconds.

params.lockedTS: The timestamp to get the staked tokens for.

getStakes(address).return: The arrays of dates and stakes.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._data: The data will be used for low level call.

params.amount: The number of tokens to stake.
params.delegatee: The address of the delegatee or 0x0 if there is none.
params.stakeFor: The address to stake the tokens for or 0x0 if staking for oneself.
params.until: Timestamp indicating the date until which to stake.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to stake.
params.cliff: The time interval to the first withdraw.
params.delegatee: The address of the delegatee or 0x0 if there is none.
params.intervalLength: The length of each staking interval when cliff passed.
params.stakeFor: The address to stake the tokens for or 0x0 if staking for oneself.

stakeWithApproval(address,uint96,uint256.details: This function will be invoked from receiveApprovalSOV.approveAndCall -> this.receiveApproval -> this.stakeWithApproval

params.amount: The number of tokens to stake.
params.delegatee: The address of the delegatee or 0x0 if there is none.
params.stakeFor: The address to stake the tokens for or 0x0 if staking for oneself.
params.until: Timestamp indicating the date until which to stake.

stakesBySchedule(uint256,uint256,uint256.details: DO NOT USE this misspelled function. Use stakeBySchedule function instead. This function cannot be deprecated while we have non-upgradeable vesting contracts.

timestampToLockDate(uint256).return: The actual unlocking date (might be up to 2 weeks shorter than intended).

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the number of staked tokens held by the user account.

extendStakingDuration(uint256,uint256).notice: Extend the staking duration until the specified date.

getCurrentStakedUntil(uint256).notice: Get the current number of tokens staked for a day.

getStakes(address).notice: Get list of stakes for a user account.

stake(uint96,uint256,address,address).notice: Stake the given amount for the given duration of time.

stakeBySchedule(uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Stake tokens according to the vesting schedule.

stakeWithApproval(address,uint96,uint256.notice: Stake the given amount for the given duration of time.

timestampToLockDate(uint256).notice: Unstaking is possible every 2 weeks only. This means, to calculate the key value for the staking checkpoints, we need to map the intended timestamp to the closest available date.
